segments.text: Julia , I have good news for you .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have earned a lot of money this week , more than I do in a fortnight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is really good news . How much do you earn a week now ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My wages are six hundred dollars a week . But I find a part-time job to supplement my income .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Darling , I know you are a good husband . You don't have to work so hard . After all your health is the most important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know , darling . I must earn enough money to buy a car . I do a part-time job to increase my income . Don't worry , I will take care of myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see . You must have more rest .
segments.speaker: S2
